widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: CACI & CALCRIM:
config.description: Our team updated the California Civil Jury Instructions and California Criminal Jury Instructions to the latest version.

config.title: Oyez Advocates:
config.description: We added a new place to showcase all the advocates who litigated U.S. Supreme Court cases. The advocates are listed in alphabetical order.

config.title: GeoIP2 Database Migration:
config.description: Some of our applications rely on IP-address geolocalization for some features, such as identifying the city of a contact form user. We performed a mass upgrade to all our geolocalization databases so our data remains accurate.

config.title: Maintenances:
config.description: Our IT Team is busy working on security patches and upgrades all across the board daily. This month, they worked on the backend infrastructure for some Justia properties, such as the Justia Lawyer Directory, Patents, and Trademarks.
